body_html: hi @cpuhrsch I just built a few minutes ago. the cpuinfo is just a warning but now it fails with : c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx2’ c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx’ looks like the problem is in : https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/5fa3aac610ee234338dbc11eb5b6d4a133cb483d/aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt#L55 From: cpuhrsch <notifications@github.com> To: pytorch/pytorch <pytorch@noreply.github.com> Cc: avmgithub <>, Comment <comment@noreply.github.com> Date: 03/20/2018 12:02 Subject: Re: [pytorch/pytorch] ATen ReduceOps Re-merge (#5776) @sdmonov, I updated the cpuinfo submodule and it should now be possible to build this on ppc64le. Could you please try updating and building it again and let me know if it doesn't work? Thank you. — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
body_text:
hi @cpuhrsch

I just built a few minutes ago.   the cpuinfo is just a warning but now it
fails with :

c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx2’
c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx’

looks like the problem is in   :
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/5fa3aac610ee234338dbc11eb5b6d4a133cb483d/aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt#L55


From:   cpuhrsch <notifications@github.com>
To:     pytorch/pytorch <pytorch@noreply.github.com>
Cc:     avmgithub <>, Comment
<comment@noreply.github.com>
Date:   03/20/2018 12:02
Subject:        Re: [pytorch/pytorch] ATen ReduceOps Re-merge (#5776)



@sdmonov, I updated the cpuinfo submodule and it should now be possible to
build this on ppc64le. Could you please try updating and building it again
and let me know if it doesn't work? Thank you.
—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
body:
hi @cpuhrsch 

I just built a few minutes ago.   the cpuinfo is just a warning but now it 
fails with :

c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx2’
c++: error: unrecognized command line option ‘-mavx’

looks like the problem is in   :  
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/5fa3aac610ee234338dbc11eb5b6d4a133cb483d/aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt#L55


From:   cpuhrsch <notifications@github.com>
To:     pytorch/pytorch <pytorch@noreply.github.com>
Cc:     avmgithub <>, Comment 
<comment@noreply.github.com>
Date:   03/20/2018 12:02
Subject:        Re: [pytorch/pytorch] ATen ReduceOps Re-merge (#5776)



@sdmonov, I updated the cpuinfo submodule and it should now be possible to 
build this on ppc64le. Could you please try updating and building it again 
and let me know if it doesn't work? Thank you.
—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
